import React, { useState,useEffect} from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; // Import Bootstrap import "./cart.css"; const Cart = () => { const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:8080/cart/") // Fetching from backend .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => setCartItems(data)) .catch((error) => console.error("Error fetching items:", error)); }, []); return (
{cartItems.map((item, index) => ( ))}
Product ID Product Name Quantity Price Total Action
{item.cart_id} {item.name} â‚¹{item.price} â‚¹{item.cart_quantity * item.price}
) }; export default Cart;
